name: feComposite
desc:
This filter performs the combination of the two input images pixel-wise in image space using one of the Porter-Duff compositing operations: over, in, atop, out, xor, lighter. Additionally, a component-wise arithmetic operation (with the result clamped between [0..1]) can be applied.

The arithmetic operation is useful for combining the output from the feDiffuseLighting and feSpecularLighting filters with texture data. It is also useful for implementing dissolve.

props.name: operator
props.value: over | in | out | atop | xor | lighter | arithmetic
props.desc: The compositing operation that is to be performed. The lacuna value is over.

props.name: k1
props.desc:
Only applicable if operator arithmetic.

The lacuna value is 0.

props.name: k2
props.desc:
Only applicable if operator arithmetic.

The lacuna value is 0.

props.name: k3
props.desc:
Only applicable if operator arithmetic.

The lacuna value is 0.

props.name: k4
props.desc:
Only applicable if operator arithmetic.

The lacuna value is 0.
